name: Mahjong Solitaire: Grand Autumn Harvest
description:
Looking for a relaxing puzzle game? Welcome to Mahjong Autumn Harvest!

Enjoy 100s of unique mahjong puzzles for all difficulty levels and so much more – receive lots of free rewards & prizes, collect & craft valuable world treasures, unlock stunning HD artwork and evolve your pet as you play! With more content and bonus levels added each week, the mahjongg fun never stops!

----------------------------------------------------------------
MAHJONG AUTUMN HARVEST - HIGHLIGHTS
----------------------------------------------------------------
⦁ Classic mahjongg solitaire rules with an Autumn Harvest theme
⦁ Easy to understand gameplay suitable for all ages
⦁ Helpful hints are always available when you need them
⦁ Match tiles on an epic journey with over 100 levels
⦁ Rescue and evolve your pet!
⦁ More maps, features & levels added every month!
⦁ Normal and challenging expert modes for mahjongg solitaire experts
⦁ Bonus levels with various ways to play
⦁ Collect Mahjong Autumn Harvest artwork, save & use as a HD background
⦁ Complete dark dungeon levels in each map to earn HUGE rewards
⦁ Free daily rewards & coins for active players
⦁ Each level uses its own unique themed tile sets
⦁ Replay each level as many times as you like to earn more coins
⦁ Earn coins to unlock more exciting mahjongg boards
⦁ Play mahjongg offline, no wifi needed!

★ Fun, Relaxing & Casual Mahjong
We’ve designed our puzzles to be relaxing and fun, suitable for players of all skill levels – whether you’re a mahjong expert or a beginner! All of our puzzles are always solvable so you can sit back, relax and enjoy the game without worrying that you’ve made the wrong move and made the puzzle impossible.

If you ever get stuck, hints are only a tap away!

★ Collect & Craft Rare Treasures
As you go on your Mahjong Autumn Harvest journey you’ll discover ancient, rare artefacts. Collect all the crafting tiles for an artefact and you’ll be able to craft it – keep your treasures or sell them for gold coins, it’s your choice! At the end of each level, you’ll also be able to open a bonus treasure chest. What could they contain? There’s only one way to find out!

DOWNLOAD TODAY & START YOUR MAHJONG ADVENTURE!
